mapper.sql: workTime, depId, doctorID, hosId, workId, checkStatus, createTime, creator, modifyPeople, modifyDate, rejectReason, isFinish, isNotify
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.isFinish, a.rejectReason, a.workTime, a.depId, a.doctorID, a.hosId, a.workId, a.checkStatus, a.createTime, a.creator, a.modifyPeople, a.modifyDate, b.depName, c.name AS hosName, d.doctorName, e.workName FROM a JOIN t_department_info b ON a.depId = b.id JOIN t_hospital c ON a.hosId = c.id JOIN t_doctor_info d ON a.doctorID = d.id join t_work_type e on a.workId = e.id
and ( d.doctorName = #{pd.keyword} or d.doctorName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keyword}),'%') )
order by a.isFinish,a.createTime desc

select t.isNotify, t.id, d.doctorName,d.cellhone, h.name as hosName,h.contactPhone, w.workName, de.depName, t.workTime from t_work_schedule t join t_doctor_info d on t.doctorID = d.id join t_hospital h on t.hosId = h.id join t_work_type w on t.workId = w.id join t_department_info de on t.depId = de.id where t.isFinish=1 and t.isNotify =0 and t.workTime >= #{today} and t.workTime <= #{tomorrow}
mapper.update: update set checkStatus = #{checkStatus}, depId = #{depId}, hosId = #{hosId}, doctorID = #{doctorID}, workId = #{workId}, workTime = #{workTime}, modifyPeople = #{modifyPeople}, modifyDate = #{modifyDate}, rejectReason = #{reason} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.rejectReason, a.workTime, a.depId, a.doctorID, a.hosId, a.workId, a.checkStatus, a.createTime, a.creator, a.modifyPeople, a.modifyDate, b.depName, c. name AS hosName, d.doctorName FROM a JOIN t_department_info b ON a.depId = b.id JOIN t_hospital c ON a.hosId = c.id JOIN t_doctor_info d ON a.doctorID = d.id and a.id = #{id}
select * from t_department_info a where a.depHos = #{id}
